TopicTitle: Will we see any previews from youtubers before the 0.2 release?

Articles.Content: Just wondering if some of the youtubers get early access and will treat us with previews.

We know that some content creators have gotten early access to the content. But the post informing us of that also said they are releasing their early previews on the 19th. Considering how Intercept usually interacts with community creators1, its probably Embargoed until the update goes live on steam, but its possible within that wording for the videos to come out in the morning hours before the update.

 

1. This isn't a jab at the team, just making it clear they prefer gated content over more open early access periods to updates as some other developers tend to do. Both approaches are valid, especially for a game that wants to promote player discovery, no fun to see it all in a tuber update before you find it yourself
